column1: Happy Thanksgiving to those across PA-01! As we look back on this difficult year may we always remember what we are most thankful for. Wishing everyone health and happiness during the holiday season! #OneCommunity https://t.co/n9fjfgr6BK

If a city chooses to defund their police they will be choosing to defund themselves of federal assistance. I stand with our hero men and women who have dedicated their lives to keep our communities safe.

To protect our law enforcement officers from this extremist movement I introduced the “Defund Cities that Defund Our Police Act” to make sure that our hero police officers are well-funded not defunded.

We can achieve sensible police reform while simultaneously supporting our heroes serving us in law enforcement. This so-called “defund the police” movement is dangerous and misguided. https://t.co/NoKUXXndpQ

This increased violence against police officers is making the law enforcement profession even more dangerous that it already is which will hurt recruitment and retention which will ultimately make our communities less safe.

Supporting common-sense reforms to the system and supporting the men and women in law enforcement are not mutually exclusive.  Our law enforcement officers and the communities that they serve are both in need of our support right now.

The disrespect that our police officers are being shown across the country is a real problem.  Anyone who violently assaults a police officer is a threat to the community and should not be released without bail. https://t.co/5ScoaoYrAf
